item.title: 委内瑞拉在选举消费狂潮中增加美元供应
item.description: 委内瑞拉政府正在加大美元销售力度，以遏制尼古拉斯-马杜罗的总统竞选开支所带来的通货膨胀效应。【原文：Venezuela’s government is ramping up dollar sales to contain inflationary effects resulting from Nicolás Maduro’s presidential campaign spending.】

item.title: 债券销售激增，投资者需求旺盛
item.description: 由于越来越多的人预期美联储最快将于 9 月份开始降息，发行商们将目光投向了借贷成本降低的前景，市政债券的销售量正以几周来最快的速度激增。【原文：Municipal bond sales are surging at the fastest clip in weeks as issuers focus on the prospect of lower borrowing costs amid growing expectations that the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates as soon as September.】

item.title: 部长称南非旅游业增长强劲
item.description: 南非旅游部长帕特里夏-德-里尔（Patricia de Lille）表示，1 月至 5 月间，南非旅游人数同比增长 9.7%，达到约 380 万人次。【原文：South African tourism grew by 9.7% to about 3.8 million arrivals between January and May, compared with a year ago, Tourism Minister Patricia de Lille said.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉政府镇压行动在 7 月 28 日投票前激增
item.description: 据总部设在加拉加斯的一个人权组织周二报告，自委内瑞拉总统竞选活动于 7 月 4 日开始以来，已有约 77 名反对派支持者和助手被捕。【原文：About 77 opposition supporters and aides have been arrested since Venezuela’s presidential campaign began on July 4, a Caracas-based human rights organization reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 前保守党议员成立投资银行，帮助新市场 "改变世界

item.title: 以太币 ETF 现货最早将于下周开始交易

Three of the issuers said the agency signaled trading may begin on July 23.】

item.title: 欧盟国家表示支持对中国电动汽车征收临时关税

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司初级债券下挫，严重减值风险增加

item.title: 阿迪达斯上调预测，因桑巴和 Yeezys 需求强劲

item.title: 荷兰机构称诺和诺德的 Wegovy 成本过高

item.title: Blackstone、CVC 权衡对凯雷旗下 StandardAero 的出价
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 和 CVC Capital Partners Plc 等私募股权投资公司正在权衡对 StandardAero 的出价，对这家飞机维修服务提供商的估值可能达到或超过 100 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and CVC Capital Partners Plc are among the private equity firms weighing bids for StandardAero that could value the aircraft maintenance services provider at $10 billion or more including debt, people with knowledge of the matter said.】
